name: PC Quester
description:
PC Quester is an operating system used to entertain and educate the user. You can browse all files, view all web pages and adjust all settings. If you have checked everything, you can try the task mode. In this mode you have 20 seconds to complete a simple task. The difficulty of the task is random. Don't be afraid to lose, you can always start another quest!

Controls:

Left mouse button - for opening applications or files and clicking buttons

Right mouse button - for closing applications in the bottom bar

This game was made for "20 Second Game Jam"
